events.name: Campaign Spotlight: SatanCon 2023 Unveiling
events.description: Join SatanCon’s organizing committee unveils plans for SatanCon 2023 with Chalice Blythe and Karl Kasarda.

events.name: Inviolable: Legal Spellwork and Practical Tools for Protecting Ourselves in Life and Death with Shiva Honey
events.description: As Satanists, we believe that our body is inviolable, yet LGBTQIA+ individuals face significant discrimination within the healthcare system and often experience considerable barriers to having our wishes respected in death. Using the research, resources, and the tools from her latest book, The Devil’s Death: Your Satanic Companion for Grief and Dying, Priestess Shiva Honey will discuss how to use legal spellwork and practical tools to assert our rights and protect ourselves within a healthcare setting and have our end-of-life directives fulfilled.

events.name: Tom The Witch's Neighborhood: Pride
events.description: oin Salem historian, witch, and satanic minister Thomas O'Brien Vallor for some educational programming. Special guests, field trips, and more! This episode is all about Baphomet! Brought to you by the number 7!

events.name: Unveiling Day Benediction by Vicar Xixter Midnite
events.description: Benedictions explore the spirit of their respective holidays. Benedictions for Satanic holiday events focus people's attention on the religious importance of the holiday. They are a performance as much as they are a declaration, creating a feeling of religious connection and meaning.

events.name: Whimsical Blasphemy with DJ Mercy Maelica
events.description: Join Mercy, our veteran performer and Resident DJ for music and videos live from Salem.
